Package org.daisy.braille.embosser

Provides interfaces and classes needed to implement embossers.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Embosser Provides an interface for common properties of an Embosser.
EmbosserFilter Provides an interface for filtering a collection of Embossers.
EmbosserProperties Provides an interface for common embosser related properties.
EmbosserProvider Provides an interface for a collection of Embossers.
EmbosserWriter Provides an embosser communication interface.
EmbosserWriterProperties Provides information about the embosser.
LineBreaks  
VolumeWriter Provides an interface for writing a volume of braille to a file.
 

Class Summary
AbstractEmbosser  
AbstractEmbosserWriter Provides an abstract base for embossers.
BufferedVolumeEmbosser Provides a buffered volume embossers.
BufferedVolumeEmbosser.Builder  
ConfigurableEmbosser Provides a configurable embosser.
ConfigurableEmbosser.Builder  
DefaultEmbosserCatalog  
EmbosserCatalog Provides a catalog of Embosser factories.
EmbosserFeatures  
EmbosserTools  
FileToDeviceEmbosserWriter Provides a bridge between a PrinterDevice and file based EmbosserWriter
SimpleEmbosserProperties  
StandardLineBreaks  
 

Enum Summary
AbstractEmbosserWriter.Padding  
StandardLineBreaks.Type  
 

Exception Summary
EmbosserFactoryException  
UnsupportedPaperException  
UnsupportedWidthException  
 

Package org.daisy.braille.embosser Description

Provides interfaces and classes needed to implement embossers.
